reviews.review_msg: Claudia is one of the best professors at SFU. She is very caring and goes above and beyond to help you out. I am very grateful I took 5 classes with her during my undergrad. I would recommend taking a class with her!

Took 102, 103, 201, and 202 with Claudia and she made them as engaging, clear, and consistent as it is fun. She wants to see you speak German well! Note SFU dept cuts mean 300 is only allowed every two years. I had a 1.5 year gap between 202 and 300, but Claudia assured me 'das ist normal' to forget a little and got me up to speed in two weeks!

Took German with Claudia for three years, and I loved every class. She cares about you and your grade, and will try her hardest to help you out. She is clear about what are on the module tests, and always offers class time to review questions. Vocab quiz every class (she offers a Quizlet she makes herself) and a module test (3 units) every 2 weeks.

Claudia was absolutely amazing! Class attendance is part of your overall grade, but you won't even want to miss class because it is actually fun, and since classes are small you get to know everyone. She is an extremely fair marker & assignments are not hard and she is flexible with deadlines. I would recommend Claudia and this class to anyone!
